reviewText: This would be fine for puppies 6-12 weeks old.  There is a lot of time wasted on this dvd instead of actual helpful training.

"How to Talk Dog" is a great puppy training tool for puppies over 4-5 months old.  You actually can see a difference in your dog after applying the techniques Bill Matney teaches.  I have also purchased his second dvd which goes into more detail on the different types of problems that you might be having with your dog.
